doc:
Paul Perri https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Perri 0 Paul John Perri (born November 6, 1953) is an American-Canadian film and television actor. Perri is best known for portraying Edwards and Skinless Parker in Hellraiser: Bloodline, Harry Hume from Chaos, and as Dr. Sidney Bloom from Manhunter. Paul_John_Perri ( born November_6_,_1953 ) is an_American-Canadian_film_and_television_actor . Perri is_best_known for portraying_Edwards_and_Skinless_Parker in Hellraiser : Bloodline , Harry_Hume from Chaos , and as Dr._Sidney_Bloom from Manhunter .
